LANDING-text: Guide your airship through Cartier’s world of marvels, gather as many gems as possible, and share this fabulous journey with your friends.
LANDING-legal: By clicking Start your journey, I agree my personal information will be shared with Cartier for the purposes of playing this game in accordance with Cartier’s {{LEGALS}}.
TUTORIAL-two-all:
Catch the gems
to reach the Fabulous Cartier House
CHAPTER-END-1-title: You have reached the end of the first stage of your journey.
CHAPTER-END-2-title: You have reached the end of the second stage of your journey.
CHAPTER-END-textA: Subscribe now to save your score,
CHAPTER-END-textB: or click below to continue your journey. ​
LOOSE-text: You've not quite reached the end of this fabulous journey, but there's always next time!
WIN-text: You have reached the end of your journey!
END-text: Share this fabulous journey with friends and loved ones and save your score to chart your progress.
END-text-alt: Share this fabulous journey with your loved ones and sign up to receive the latest news from Cartier.
REGISTER-text: Sign up to save your score.
REGISTER-legals: I would like to receive marketing information about the Maison’s products or services.
REGISTER-legals-msg: You agree you are able to retain your score to this game, the Fabulous Cartier Journey, in exchange to allow Cartier to send you marketing information about its products and services. We, Cartier, may send you this information using e-mail, text, telephone or post. We may also use your information to deliver personalised messages or advertising on social media or other digital platforms. You can ask us to stop marketing at any time. For further information about how we use your personal information, please see our {{LEGALS}}
REGISTER-error-length: This field must contain between 1 and 32 characters maximum.
REGISTER-error-characters: This field can only contain alphanumeric characters.
REGISTER-500: Sorry, something went wrong... Please try again.
CONFIRMATION-title: You are now subscribed to Cartier updates.
OLD-text: You are using a device or browser version that is not compatible with this game. Please try using a different browser or device to access this content.
COPY-LINK-text: I collected {{SCORE}} gems on The Fabulous Cartier Journey. Now it's your turn to play at {{URL}}
SITE-description: Pilot your airship through the wonderful worlds of Cartier, collect as many gems as possible and share this fabulous journey with your loved ones.
